review: I went to meet the doctor and it was for my father. The health issue was Cardiac treatment* ********* *** *** ****** *** ***** I waited for three hours to consult the doctor. He prescribed medicines and due in April month. I am satisfied with the treatment and I can recommend the doctor to my family or friends.

Doctor was very experienced, good and very friendly with us. I went for chest pain treatment and I was satisfied with doctor treatment. I would like to recommend this doctor to others. When it comes to improvement, the doctor availability was only 1 hour so they have to increase the availability of doctor consultation because it helps more patients. I would like to give a rating of 8.5/10 to the hospital other 1.5 I will not give because they have to need to improve food facilities.
Very friendly,gives you lot of confidence. Has a positive approach diagnosis very well makes you feel comfortable

** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ************* ** *********. We had consulted with him in Dec 20 and he very patiently explained the condition. We were relieved once we got his opinion. Would highly recommend.

I was able to meet the doctor. I took my mother for consultation. *** ****** *** ************** his behaviour was good with the patients and gave my mother good medical advice. I would recommend this doctor to my family and friends.

We had met the doctor and it was for health problem angioplasty for my father. ****** *** ********** ******** *** ********** ** *** ******.  I am satisfied with the treatment given.   I have already recommended doctor to my family or friends . There was no waiting time when I went. Only one or two members. He had undergone open heart surgery. He is fine now.

I have been to the hospital to meet the doctor and it was for heart issue met cardiologist. ** *** * **** **** ********** there was no waiting time when we visited. We had already taken reports and visited and he checked. He explained everything well. I m satisfied with treatment. I have recommended the doctor and hospital to other people and also satisfied.

The consultation experience was interesting. I'm satisfied with the doctor's treatment. There was a normal waiting time. When it comes to improvement, the canteen is not up to the mark as the canteen food is not tasty. I would like to recommend this doctor to others and the doctor was very specific, very friendly and took more care.

Hi, I got to know Dr. Charith through my grandmother who went through a stent procedure. Which was done by dr. Charith. The same to my dad. The best doctor. Would definitely recommend to my family members and friends.
